channel.title: Self on A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in Self on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: A Couple of Words
item.description: Speaking from a normal person’s point of view, does praise hurt? or if I can phrase it better, what hurts more, praise or criticism? An appropriate answer would be none, if you can take praise with your head held high you must be able to take criticism with the same attitude, right?
